website_summaries.verdict: A fun, colorful zester that's covered with a non-stick coating to make grating and zesting easier.
pros: Comes with a convenient safety cover and an attached container for mess-free use
It also comes with a spatula to help remove stuck on food particles
cons: Not a good option for grating hard cheeses

customer_reviews.title: Lable says causes cancer and reproductive harm
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product. No where in the description of this product does it let you know that the chemicals used to make it and your exposure to them by using this product can cause cancer and reproductive harm. I opened the package and found this label attached. This means they withheld this Information in an attempt to hide it from consumers.
customer_reviews.author: kleverkunstlerin

customer_reviews.title: Best zester/grater I've seen
customer_reviews.text: This really takes the mess out of zesting or grating. There's a "catcher" that acts as the squeegee to remove the grated things from the back and it also has measurement markings on the back to gauge the amount you've grated. They come with a cover that slides on and off and the sturdy bent handle is ergonomically designed. Extremely sturdily built. I was bout to give up grating in favor of something neater but this solves the problem.
customer_reviews.author: MEWTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: Best tool for zesting
customer_reviews.text: This is well made, easy and efficient to use, handily catches zest in the measuring cup below the blade, and is easy to empty and clean. I love the cover for the zester when not in use; no worries about cutting hands when digging through the cooking implements drawer.
customer_reviews.author: JKM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and clean. The cover makes it safe to store in a drawer, and I really like the backing that collects the shavings instead of having them get everywhere and make a mess. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Elaine J.

customer_reviews.title: Best Zest!
customer_reviews.text: This zester makes zesting lemons so easy, I'm always scrounging online for recipes using lemon zest! (fyi, this is a good one:  I was always a little afraid that I was getting too much pith in my zest due to every lemon zest recipe admonishing you to AVOID THE WHITE PITH AT ALL COSTS! But with this zester, I don't worry, it seems to only get the yellow skin. The little catch-all in the back is great. The only drawback is I tend to make too much zest because it's so easy. Bought 2 more as gifts for my foodie friends.
customer_reviews.author: mjr

customer_reviews.title: Best Zester Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a zester that produced a much finer zest than the one I had, and this one is perfect! Produces a very fine zest with no effort, AND, as a bonus, catches all the zest in a nifty slide-off container that catches all the zest and eliminates any mess. I’ve only had it a couple months, but I use it all the time, and it’s easy to use, easy to clean, and I’m SO glad I chose this one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great! I use it for zesting citrus
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I use it for zesting citrus, garlic and parmesan cheese. I love the little case that slides on the back as it makes the process completely mess free with the exception of parmesan cheese as removing the case compacts it back into a hard cheese. I even let my 2 year old zest lemons with it!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: I have bought a number of these and like it for fine shredding of parmesan cheese for salads
customer_reviews.text: I have bought a number of these and like it for fine shredding of parmesan cheese for salads, as well as grating ginger for many recipes. I searched a lot before getting my first one, and really like the very fine microplane edges.
customer_reviews.author: Thermaln2

customer_reviews.title: Well designed product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using a Henkels zester for years, and that works well for long strips of zest. However, I find the Henkels zester to be hard on my wrist so I bought this one on a whim. Wow! It is easy to use, requiring only light pressure. It picks up only a fine layer of zest, no pith at all. It catches the zest with no mess whatsoever. And when you remove the zest catching compartment, it pushes all the zest to one end for easy retrieval. This product is an improvement on the old fashioned style of zester and someone put some thought into its design. Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: OrchidGirl

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this zester! Easy to use, catches and measures the zest, and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: AW

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I have quite a few zesters already and none of them work very well at all. This one is exactly what I have needed for a very long time. I cook with lemons a lot and I like to use lemon on my skin so this grater is good because it grates very very finely and holds the peel in a container on the zester itself for use as needed.It's very well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: World Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Subpar quality, cool measuring container
customer_reviews.text: I thought this would actually be a better zester, but I ended up returning this for the Microplane. The quality of the blades and handle just does not match up. There is a reason most commercial kitchens carry Mircoplanes. On the plus side, the plastic container on the back is quite cool.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra N.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice to have a non stick grater
customer_reviews.text: Very nice to have a non stick grater. Plus there is a handy storage container to catch all the grated food and it measures too! That is the awesome part.
customer_reviews.author: kbill

customer_reviews.title: Works well and is easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I use this often for grating frozen fresh ginger and citrus. Works well and is easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Bagley

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding!
customer_reviews.text: This is an outstanding piece of kitchen kit. It's basically effortless to zest with this tool. The storage space underneath works well and is very convenient. You can't beat this style of zester because you can easily move it around to see the area of the fruit you are zesting so that you don't get into the bitter pith. I purchased it for use in a commercial restaurant and it has proven to be quite durable. I have used microplanes in the past, but this is now my zester of choice.
customer_reviews.author: marc hodge

customer_reviews.title: Great Zester
customer_reviews.text: This zests, measures, contains all with ease. Less mess than a regular zester.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: best zester
customer_reviews.text: This zester is fabulous. You can easily zest oranges, lemons and limes over your food. The cover has a built in measuring spoon so that with the cover on you can zest and hold for inclusion in your recipe
customer_reviews.author: Wayne K

customer_reviews.title: Zest
customer_reviews.text: This little bugger works like a charm. I read other reviews and agree with the other positive comments. I've never zested before so plan to do it alot more now. Man, it sure smells good when you use it. Like a citrus potpourri blast. I was tempted to dab a lil' behind my ear ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: handy tool
customer_reviews.text: Ok - I zested some oranges by hand...ugh...messy and took a great deal of time. The next time I needed to zest and orange...I used this and it was fast, efficient, and very helpful...works great!
customer_reviews.author: CKB

customer_reviews.title: Great zester!
customer_reviews.text: Love this zester and have bought them for daughter-in-laws. Effortless and love the texture of the zest for cooking. The cover keeps all the zest contained.
customer_reviews.author: Reading in Alaska

customer_reviews.title: No skinned knuckles, lots of zest quickly
customer_reviews.text: This zester makes quick work making orange and lemon zest quickly - it's very tedious with usual graters. No skinned knuckles either! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: LindyLouTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: easy and tidy
customer_reviews.text: This has replaced my old microplane for grating ginger and lemon zest. Makes the whole process a lot neater, and all the parts of dishwasher safe, and fit together nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great. I have another microplane, but this one blows it away. It's so comfortable and does such agreat job of shredding/zesting. Get it.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. O. Neal

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Love the way Edgeware designed this product ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Love the way Edgeware designed this product to catch and measure the zest at the same time. How convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Dibyea

customer_reviews.title: Great product...
customer_reviews.text: This zester works great. It has a little catch tray, and I'm getting LOTS more zest from my citrus than I was with my old zester. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal L. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Quality kitchen tool
customer_reviews.text: Zested a lemon in a minute with knuckles in tact and zestless lemon sturdy enough to.be easily juiced.
customer_reviews.author: M. Winter

customer_reviews.title: A Fine Zest
customer_reviews.text: Creates a fine zest. Easily washable. Appreciate the cover for the bladed side.
customer_reviews.author: S Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great investment
customer_reviews.text: Easy clean up. Love the storage container. Great grip on the handle. Perfect zesting everytime. Great investment in my book.
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Wife says it's awesome
customer_reviews.text: I don't know anything about zesters. My wife was thrilled when she used it. She said it was very easy to use and it cleaned up nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Cason

customer_reviews.title: Wildly fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: I could not believe how fine a zest this makes with absolutely no effort. Triple the quality of regular zesters. Also an added plus that you cannot scape your knuckles like most zesters. Bravo. This one is THE BEST!
customer_reviews.author: 123 T-Shirt Guy

customer_reviews.title: Great zester!
customer_reviews.text: So far, I have only used this to zest lemons, but I couldn't believe how quickly and easily it did the job. I love that it catches the zest. I even threw the whole thing in the fridge for a couple of days until I needed the rest of my zest. My only complaints are that it isn't dishwasher safe, and it is a little bigger than it needs to be.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi Larson

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE IT but...
customer_reviews.text: This zester is awesome. I had zero complaints up until about 6 months ago (and I've now had it for 2.5 years). The green coating on the front of the zester is now flaking off... and I can't decide it if is happening when I am zesting and that I'm eating the flakes or if it happens because I put it in the dishwasher. If it only flakes in the dishwasher then I really don't care but I sure don't want to be eating it! I think they could have left that coating off anyway. It seems highly unnecessary to me. If they made one like this but without the green coating, I would buy it immediately!
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this zester!!! So easy to use and clean!
customer_reviews.author: ann m. kilker

customer_reviews.title: The Better Zester
customer_reviews.text: Great little kitchen tool. Gave one as a gift too.
customer_reviews.author: B J Zeagler

customer_reviews.title: Great Zester
customer_reviews.text: I love this zester. It makes a really fine zest, but doesn't pull off any of the bitter pith. Very easy to clean and store.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time I've ever been able to get good zest off of lemons
customer_reviews.text: Have only used it on lemons so far but it works great. I'm no chef and I've never really been able to zest properly before. Now it's a piece of cake. Good design and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Received item promptly and it was exactly what I wanted......very happy with purchase and would highly recommend this item to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Barefootinal

customer_reviews.title: so easy, produces fine zest not course like some others
customer_reviews.text: so easy, produces fine zest not course like some others, and the plastic cover keeps it all neat and clea
customer_reviews.author: ruston

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Zester
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my son as I use mine daily and its the best zester ever. It will come in very handy for his fresh lemons that grow in his garden. He is so pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: ALAN MORRELL

customer_reviews.title: I use the Better Zester all the time!
customer_reviews.text: I cook gourmet recipes and am always needing lemon zest. I used to have to use a zester over a little bowl and it would tip over, or I'd miss the bowl and the zest would end up on the countertop. I love the way the Better Zester, contains the zest and I just remove the container from the grater and there is all my zest!!
customer_reviews.author: Ramona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best sestertius ever! Love the fine shreds and the way they are collected.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Galbraith

customer_reviews.title: Zesting is now my favorite thing to do!
customer_reviews.text: This product makes the chore of zesting a lemon the easiest (and now very enjoyable) prep I do! I have tried a variety of graters and finally, I found this tool which makes light work, collects the zest for you in the back compartment, and is super easy to clean. I couldn't be happier! I highly recommend this Edgeware zester.
customer_reviews.author: D.Batt

customer_reviews.title: Rubber parts get sticky......
customer_reviews.text: No doubt this is a really smooth zester. I hate it that it uses rubber on some parts of it and after using it for the first time the rubber parts get sticky and hard to wash it off.....
customer_reviews.author: Vion Lee

customer_reviews.title: Catches everything so you don't waste the zest!
customer_reviews.text: I've always wanted a really good zester, and I had been looking for a really long time before I found this one. I'm so glad I held out because it's wonderful. It catches everything in the cover so that you don't end up losing half your zest. It glides so smoothly and works like a charm. I use it in smoothies, pesto, salads, soup, and desserts. I've zested oranges, lemons, and limes and it turns out really well for all three. I would definitely recommend this zester to anyone who is looking for the best one in the market.
customer_reviews.author: AH SUSTAINABLE LIFE

customer_reviews.title: it's junk!!!
customer_reviews.text: it is so dull you can't zest anything. over 15 minute and still not a 1/4 teaspoon of lemon zest. you couldn't light a wooden match on this piece of trash. Durability! should last forever as you will never use it. Easy to clean sure is; it will never get dirty not being used. save your money and find a different brand and make! This is my first bad review ever buying on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super happy that I bought this
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this. Previously the zest would fly about on the counter, but this keeps it all neatly contained. It will hold quite a bit of zest before I have to empty it. It works quite effortlessly and the squeegy makes it empty. It cleans up easily too. The only negative thing is that it can be a bit of a trick to get the plastic cover back into the groove after emptying the zest but it gets easier with practice. I would definitely recommend this, as it is the best zester I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: C J

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my gosh, this is AWESOME! So many wonderful features. First, I love that I can zest without making a mess. It's completely contained until you slide out what you want. The measurements printed on it are supper useful and eliminate the need to dirty a measuring spoon. It's so easy to use, with no stress on my hands. It washes up beautifully and the best part is it FITS IN MY DRAWER. The color makes it super easy to find in a junk drawer.
customer_reviews.author: J. Cantin

customer_reviews.title: The perfect  Zester
customer_reviews.text: We've been thrilled with this purchase, so much so that we've bought them as gifts for friends and family. In addition to citrus, ginger, and nutmeg, I have also used it for dry cheeses. The only possible complaint is that the capacity for capturing zest is small but this is only an issue when grating cheese. It cleans easily.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic zester!
customer_reviews.text: I love this zester! It works exactly as advertised, extremely easy and functional. I love the fact that I can it keeps the zest in an enclosed container, and I can actually see the fruit while I'm zesting so I don't get any of the white pith. Easy to clean and also love the plastic protector you put on the sharp part when you store this tool. I purchased it about a year ago.
customer_reviews.author: K. Jellison

customer_reviews.title: Great zester!  Very sharp!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace my prior zester, which was no longer very sharp. This one is very similar to the old one, although a different brand. It works extremely well. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: FJLTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: I love this!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best zester ever. You won't believe how much you like having the measuring bit -- and cleanup is a breeze with the built-in tool. A friend had one and I searched far and wide to find this after using his.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie Oakes

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is a 2nd one I bought for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Nice Product
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoy this product. Easy to use, catches the ginger underneath to put into a dish, with the juice! Easy to clean! It has measures on it for TBS and such, however, I did not find that part as useful because the ginger does not always settle evenly at the bottom! Otherwise it is a nice tool to have! Use it often!
customer_reviews.author: Morgine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, nice to have a gaurd and a zest catcher.
customer_reviews.author: trying to help

customer_reviews.title: Good zester
customer_reviews.text: Great for zest and nutmeg. Not good for cheese. I prefer the versatility of the microplane. If I could own two ( which I do), this is a good one to have. If I could only have one, I'd go with the microplane.
customer_reviews.author: Negril

customer_reviews.title: Great Zester
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy, love the measuring capability, I would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: LUCY

customer_reviews.title: Love this zester!
customer_reviews.text: This is my second zester from this company. Works great! Will buy a third if need be
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had know about this zester first!
customer_reviews.text: At first I though $15.00 was too much to pay for a zester...well I purchased it anyway and could not be happier. I like the longer handel and the container that catched all the zest!. This was worth every penny! I have used the smaller zester which were a awkward and difficult to use. This is a great zester it is sturdy and the lime color is fun!
customer_reviews.author: Shawn in Chicago

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding Zester!
customer_reviews.text: This really is a better zester! It works great and is very easy to use and clean. I have used it several times and no problems at all. Works fast and makes zesting a snap.
customer_reviews.author: Stockdog

customer_reviews.title: Great Zester
customer_reviews.text: This is a great zester. I love that it has the catcher/scraper so you can easily empty it into your recipe and you know how much you actually zested. I always wash it by hand and haven't had any issues with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: kelli h

customer_reviews.title: Great Gadget
customer_reviews.text: I saw this gadget on Sara Moulton's cooking show, and it's a terrific tool, neatly collecting and measuring zest as you go.
customer_reviews.author: MWL

customer_reviews.title: I love this the cover is very nice you can zest ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this the cover is very nice you can zest and you don’t have to worry about it flying all over the place.
customer_reviews.author: BW

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves it and so do I for shaving nutmeg.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Schroeder

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Zester!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect Zester! Just what I was looking for, easy to use and clean and the plastic compartment to catch what you zest is an incredibly helpful feature.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Atkins

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic zester!
customer_reviews.text: I love this zester, it makes a very fine zest and collects it in an attached container. The built in spatula scrapes all the zest into the holder and the curve makes it easy to use. It's easy to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy one! Today!
customer_reviews.text: I am not a huge cook but when I do I love really strong flavors and I love lemon zest or orange zest to balance out most foods...savory or sweet. This is the all time best ever made zester. I feel like this will be the last zester I ever buy. Get one today.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Lowe

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Zester!
customer_reviews.text: Use this on an almost daily basis! It's wonderful to be able to zest and then see exactly how much you have and then easily add to you dish!
customer_reviews.author: Julia L King

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my gourmet cooking husband. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: CangelFerb

customer_reviews.title: Great zester
customer_reviews.text: Really sharp & zests citrus in a flash. There is no mess because peel is caught on back. Easy to use & to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product.
customer_reviews.text: can't live without it, no mess and measuring is so simple.
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful grating tool! It even has a receptacle to store the grated bits.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Zester
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding product. I've tried for years to find something that would easily zest lemons & limes with no luck. This thing works great, very easy and perfect zest. And the graduated cover makes it so easy to get the right amount. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Docon

customer_reviews.title: Try it you'll like it
customer_reviews.text: Microfiles work in the kitchen this makes it easier to collect the gradings
customer_reviews.author: Kent A. Rawlins

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best there is, measuring on catch bin and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin E. Curry

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time and was exactly what I expected. Worked great and loved the color. The catcher on the back was a great addition too.
customer_reviews.author: jill

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fabulous! I never knew zesting could be so easy. This is a good quality item, looks nice and works great!
customer_reviews.author: Superdoop9

customer_reviews.title: Love this zester
customer_reviews.text: This zester works great! I used it on a bunch of lemons that I was juicing and it worked like a charm. Highly recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: used it to puree apples for my 8 month old, it saves both the juice and pulp, very good

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!  Works beautifully!!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this!! Don't know how I got along without it!! I will purchase a second one for sure.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was hard to find and is the most useful of all the styles of zesters.
customer_reviews.author: sunday fitzgerald

customer_reviews.title: Great zester!
customer_reviews.text: This zester was so quick and easy to use! The little tray catches the zest and it doesn't go everywhere. Quick clean up. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This may be a one-trick pony (zester), but it's a good design that catches grated citrus zest for easy handling and breaks down quickly for a fast cleanup.
customer_reviews.author: M E M

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very good at zesting. Solidly built product that will last a lifetime. Love the idea that the zest is stored in the handle.

customer_reviews.title: Great tool, super price for this unique zester!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, great tool for the person who loves to cook!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We use this all the time and really like it.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Steager

customer_reviews.title: Best zester I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: Best zester I've ever used. I've purchased this twice for myself (my first one wore out after 3 years of very heavy use) and countless times for friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Hubble

customer_reviews.title: I love it and bought it for my friends for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: I love it and bought it for my friends for Christmas! I made then a batch of Lemon and Lime zest shortbread cookies to go with it!
customer_reviews.author: Antoinette Good

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because of the reviews and suggestion by Cook's Country. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: GrandGirl

customer_reviews.title: I ordered this for my daughter who so much liked mine! It's excellent and so convenient to have ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter who so much liked mine! It's excellent and so convenient to have the little collection box to catch the citrus zest. The collecting box is so handy.
customer_reviews.author: Missus

customer_reviews.title: this one is by far the best! I love how there is a clear cup ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had several zester...this one is by far the best! I love how there is a clear cup that catches all the grated zest. It is a fabulous tool! A must for every serious cook!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended! I don't scrape my fingers, the zest falls neatly into the compartment, and it cleans like a dream. One of my better investments!
customer_reviews.author: R.L.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use it without the product coming apart. I saw it on Sara's Weekend Meals on PBS. At least I think it's the same one. It's bigger than I thought and when you try to use the measuring function, it fell off on the floor. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Bird Lover

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love it, grates perfectly. Highly recommend it. Like that it has a cover to protect it in the drawer, great
customer_reviews.author: Judy Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Love that it keeps the zest inside clear holder on ...
customer_reviews.text: Love that it keeps the zest inside clear holder on back so you can empty out into your recipes later. Zest doesn't fly everywhere. Stays put until your ready for it. When you have to zest a lot like a 1/4 cup, you want to save as much of the zest as you can. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: cat

customer_reviews.title: The very Best Zester.
customer_reviews.text: I like to make Lemon Cake and wanted a quick and efficient zester. This one is fantastic, quick, easy and I ended up with more zest that I had ever had before.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great grater - except for the bright green paint in my food!
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this five stars until the paint start coming off into my food. I've had this for one year and have not used it that much. It grates beautifully, but now it's trash after one year? What's up with that?! I'm very disappointed in the quality and won't rebuy another one that will probably start shedding in another year. Very disappointed! Please make one that doesn't have the food surface painted!
customer_reviews.author: JOSoCal

customer_reviews.title: great design and ergonomics
customer_reviews.text: Much improved design over other straight blade zesters. However remember, it only microzests. not good for thin long ribbins of zest for garnish.

product_meta.title: KitchenIQ Better Zester, Green
product_meta.description: Color:GreenUsing the KitchenIQ Better zester is just fun! Never before has zesting been so effortless. The combination of the V-etched teeth and non stick coating allow the zester to skim smoothly across the surface of rough citrus while producing thin wisps of flavorful zest without grating into the bitter pith. The fram of this unique zester is formed with a slight curve allowing a smoother, more steady stroke when zesting. KitchenIQ has added additional features like the fresh zest storage container with its squeegee for easy zest removal from the blade. The KitchenIQ Zester is simply a better eay to zest!
feature_bullets: Patent Pending V-etched Zester Blade for zesting of al types of citrus
Patent pending non-stick coating for smoother zesting and easy clean up
Fresh zest storage container with measurements
Non-slip tip; Ergonomic soft tough handle
